main_definition: Hopkins can refer to a surname, an institution (specifically Johns Hopkins University), or an idiomatic expression that implies someone is taking matters into their own hands due to necessity.

meanings_and_examples.example: John Hopkins graduated from Johns Hopkins University with a degree in engineering.
I am attending lectures at Johns Hopkins University for my Master's degree.
With the power out, they had to hopkins their way through the darkness using flashlights and a map of the area.
